meanings.definition: A ray or beam of light.
meanings.sent1: The leams of sunlight peeked through the curtains.
meanings.sent2: The leams from the lighthouse guided the ships safely to shore.
meanings.sent3: The leams danced on the wall as the disco ball spun around.
meanings.sent4: Her smile sent leams of happiness into the room.
meanings.sent5: The leams of the setting sun painted the sky in shades of orange and pink.
